caption: Beside a carriage, a girl gazes arrogantly at a boy who seems to be speaking to her, but the boy pays him no mind.In a snowy landscape, a group of people are walking, engrossed in a very serious conversation. They appear deeply concerned, suggesting a grim situation.Inside a basement, a woman and a man engage in a conversation. The man seems to admire the woman and makes promises to her, but she does not agree.
